description: Standard playbook for Professional Services and Consulting contracts

requirements.description: Detailed scope of work with specific deliverables and timelines
requirements.preferred_language: The Services shall include the following specific deliverables: [LIST]. Each deliverable shall meet the acceptance criteria specified in Exhibit A. Timeline: [SPECIFIC DATES]. Any changes to scope require a written change order signed by both parties.

requirements.description: Customer owns all work product and deliverables
requirements.preferred_language: All work product, deliverables, inventions, and intellectual property created by Vendor in performing the Services shall be deemed 'works made for hire' and shall be the sole and exclusive property of Customer. To the extent any work product does not qualify as work made for hire, Vendor hereby assigns all rights, title, and interest to Customer.
key_points: Includes all deliverables and work product

requirements.description: Background checks for personnel with access to facilities or data
requirements.preferred_language: Vendor shall conduct criminal background checks on all personnel who will have access to Customer's facilities, systems, or confidential information. Vendor shall provide evidence of such checks upon request and immediately remove any personnel who fail to pass.

requirements.description: Identification of key personnel and substitution rights
requirements.preferred_language: The following individuals are designated as Key Personnel: [NAMES]. Vendor shall not substitute Key Personnel without Customer's prior written consent, which shall not be unreasonably withheld. Substitutions must have equivalent qualifications and experience.

requirements.description: Formal change order process for scope changes
requirements.preferred_language: No changes to the scope, schedule, or fees shall be valid unless documented in a written change order signed by authorized representatives of both parties. Change orders shall specify: (i) description of change; (ii) impact on schedule; (iii) impact on fees; (iv) revised acceptance criteria if applicable.
key_points: Impact on schedule and budget specified

requirements.description: Milestone-based payments tied to deliverable acceptance
requirements.preferred_language: Fees shall be paid based on completion and acceptance of milestones as follows: [MILESTONE TABLE]. Each milestone payment is contingent upon Customer's acceptance of the associated deliverable. Customer shall have [X] days to review and accept or reject deliverables.

requirements.description: Time and materials without deliverables or caps is discouraged
key_points: Prefer fixed price or capped T&M

requirements.preferred_language: Each party shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the other party from third-party claims arising from: (i) breach of this Agreement; (ii) negligence or willful misconduct; (iii) violation of applicable laws; (iv) infringement of intellectual property rights (Vendor only for Services and deliverables).

requirements.description: Service quality and professional standards warranties
requirements.preferred_language: Vendor warrants that: (i) Services will be performed in a professional and workmanlike manner consistent with industry standards; (ii) deliverables will conform to specifications and be free from defects; (iii) Vendor has the right to grant the licenses and assignments herein; (iv) Services will not infringe third-party IP rights. Warranty period: [90 days minimum] from acceptance.

During the term and for twelve (12) months thereafter, neither party shall directly solicit for employment any employee of the other party who has been involved in the performance of this Agreement, without prior written consent. This does not prohibit general advertisements or recruiters.
